originalText.text: Dr. Nick truly helped me go from extreme painful walking to I am walking at ease and comfort! It’s life back again!  He corrected a former years ago toe joint implant.  Not going to fib 1st few days were painful  (just 3-4 days …I wasn’t taking pain killers) but it was the quickest recovery from surgery I’ve had!  I am definitely going to start jogging again this spring!  I’m very grateful and thankful!

originalText.text: I don't usually write reviews but I have had the best experience at Silverstone Podiatry.  All of the doctors that I have seen there are amazing.  They are caring and companionate, which is hard to come by these days! Over the years Dr. Argerakis has fixed a few problems that have come up with my toe, foot and ankle. I can't thank them enough for fixing all of my issues.  I would give 10 starts if I could.

text.text: I don't usually write reviews but I have had the best experience at Silverstone Podiatry.  All of the doctors that I have seen there are amazing. originalText.text: Dr Argerakis is an excellent podiatrist and I highly recommend him. He is patient and puts careful thought into the care of his patients. I found his office staff friendly and helpful. My experience with him was extremely helpful. He gave extra time in all my office visits and took the effort to make sure I was healed and well cared for. He is intelligent and gives all his patients special attention.

text.text: Dr Argerakis is an excellent podiatrist and I highly recommend him. He is patient and puts careful thought into the care of his patients. I found his office staff friendly and helpful. My experience with him was extremely helpful. He gave extra time in all my office visits and took the effort to make sure I was healed and well cared for. He is intelligent and gives all his patients special attention.

originalText.text: I was really fortunate to have a friend recommend me to Dr. Nick Argerakis. He studied my CT scan and X-rays very meticulously and clearly communicated the proper steps to take for the healing process. The reviews are all true; Dr. Argerakis has excellent bedside manner, he is an expert in his field, and his compassion will leave you feeling very comfortable, safe and at relieved. If you are suffering from a traumatic foot injury, I would highly recommend that you choose him to care of you immediately.

originalText.text:
doctor Nick is really amazing. i waited 7 years to do my bunion surgery since i was not ready for the long recovery.
I can't believe that i'm in sneakers two weeks after the surgery. every thing he said was right on point and super professional.
i'm impressed, highly recommended.
